#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
string ans[]={"even","odd"};
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    int T;
    string s;
    cin>>T;
    while(T--)
    {
        cin>>s;
        int d=s[s.size()-1]-'0';
        int c=1;
        while(!d&&s[s.size()-c]!='.')
        {
            ++c;
            d=s[s.size()-c]-'0';
        }
        if(s[s.size()-c]=='.')
        {
        d=s[s.size()-c-1]-'0';
        }
        cout<<ans[d&1]<<endl;
    }
    return 0;

 }
